main event: A civilian observer sighted a bright whitish-yellow light in Highland Park, New Jersey on March 26, 1969.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 25 seconds,The object traveled in an erratic course and speed before disappearing,The observer suspected the object might be a hot air balloon,No physical evidence was recorded from the sighting,The object was brighter than a star and was noticed while playing basketball.
sighted object: a bright whitish-yellow light in the sky
witness description: The main observer is a 14-year-old amateur astronomer.
